TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConfigurationSet extends System.Object

summary.span: 类表示一个或多个 AD LDS 实例的配置集。

span.span: The class represents a configuration set for one or more AD LDS instances.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet GetConfigurationSet(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetConfigurationSet (context As DirectoryContext) As ConfigurationSet

param.name: context
param.span: 对象，它包含用于检索对象的目标和凭据。

span.span: An object that contains the target and credentials to use to retrieve the object.

param.span: 上下文的目标可以是一个 AD LDS 实例，也可以是一个在可以标识配置集的当前目录林中的 serviceConnectionPoint 对象中指定的关键字。

span.span: The target of the context can be an AD LDS instance or keywords that are specified in the serviceConnectionPoint object in the current forest that can identify the configuration set.

summary.span: 返回所指定目录上下文的 对象。

span.span: Returns an object for the specified directory context.

returns.span: 一个 对象，它表示指定上下文的配置集。

exception.span: 未能找到 参数中指定的目标。

span.span: A target specified in the parameter could not be found.

exception.span: 对基础目录服务的调用导致了错误。

span.span: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
is .
The parameter is not valid.
